title: Initialize Mapped Array
description: In this lab, we will explore how to initialize and fill an array with specified values using a mapping function in JavaScript. We will be using the Array() constructor to create an array of the desired length and the Array.prototype.fill() method to fill it with null values. Additionally, we will be using the Array.prototype.map() method to fill the array with the desired values using the provided function.

meta.title: Initializing Mapped Arrays in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to create and fill arrays with specified values using mapping functions in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, initialization, javascript practice online, javascript lab, mapping, javascript tutor, array, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 初始化映射数组
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript中的映射函数用指定值初始化并填充数组。我们将使用Array()构造函数创建所需长度的数组，并使用Array.prototype.fill()方法用空值填充它。此外，我们将使用Array.prototype.map()方法，通过提供的函数用所需值填充数组。

meta.title: 在JavaScript中初始化映射数组
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript中的映射函数创建并填充具有指定值的数组。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 初始化, 在线JavaScript练习, JavaScript实验, 映射, JavaScript教程, 数组, 编程
